title: $:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager
author: Matt Lauber

{"tiddlers":{"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate","created":"20190107162350576","modified":"20210708122739647","text":"\define delete-edittemplate-state-tiddlers() <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] []"/> \define save-tiddler-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-field" $name={{{ [get[text]] }}} $value={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-tiddler"/> \end \define cancel-delete-tiddler-actions(message) <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-$message$-tiddler"/> \end \define save-tiddler-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-field" $name={{{ [get[text]] }}} $value={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-tiddler"/> \end \define frame-classes() {{{ tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-edit-frame [is[tiddler]then[tc-tiddler-exists]] [is[missing]!is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-missing]] [is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-exists tc-tiddler-shadow]] [is[system]then[tc-tiddler-system]] [{!!class}] [tags[]encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-tagged-]] +[join[ ]] }}} \end <$list filter="[all[current]get[type]addprefix[$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/]] [[$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/default]] +[first[]]" variable="type"> <$transclude tiddler=<>><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/default"> "},"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/Creature":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/Creature","created":"20170920212215536","modified":"20171101195300823","tags":"","text":"

<$list filter="[all[current]fields[]] +[sort[title]] -actions -alignment -armor -cha -challenge -con -conditionimmunities -creaturetype -dex -hitpoints -immunities -int -properties -senses -size -speed -str -wis -resistances" variable="currentField"> <$list filter=<> variable="temp">
<$text text=<>/>: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}}/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Caption}}> <$action-deletefield $field=<>/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}

"},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/StatBlockTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/StatBlockTemplate","created":"20170920151434459","modified":"20190809001251991","tags":"","text":"\define abilities-block(str, dex, con, int, wis, cha) \end

<$link>{{!!title}}

{{!!size}} {{!!creature_type}}<$list filter="[all[current]has[subtype]]"> ({{!!subtype}}), {{!!alignment}}

Armor Class

{{!!ac}}<$list filter="[is[current]has[ac_description]]" variable=""> ({{!!ac_description}})

Hit Points

{{!!hp}}<$list filter="[is[current]has[hp_generation]]" variable=""> ({{!!hp_generation}})

Speed

{{!!speed}}

 <$macrocall $name="abilities-block" str={{!!str}} dex={{!!dex}} con={{!!con}} int={{!!int}} wis={{!!wis}} cha={{!!cha}} /> <$list filter="[is[current]has[saving_throws]]" variable="">

Body","created":"20201028035043820","modified":"20201028035123214","tags":"","text":"\define filters() [all[tiddlers+shadows]type[Creature]<$list filter="[[$:/temp/Creature Filter]fields[]] -title -created -modified -text -sort" variable="field"><$list filter="[[$:/temp/Creature Filter]has]" variable="">in:<>[$:/temp/Creature Filter!!<>]sortan{$:/temp/Creature Filter!!sort}] \end <$wikify name="filter" text=<> > <$list filter=<>> <$link>{{!!title}} <$list filter="[enlist{$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/lookups!!column_order}] -[[title]]" variable="column"> <$transclude field=<> /> "},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/Table Header":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/Table Header","created":"20201027132941068","modified":"20201028035135094","tags":"","text":" <$list filter="[enlist{$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/lookups!!column_order}]" variable="column"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="$:/temp/Creature Filter!!sort" setTo=<> ><$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/lookups" index=<> /> <$list filter="[enlist{$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/lookups!!column_order}] -[[title]]" variable="column"> <$select multiple tiddler="$:/temp/Creature Filter" field=<> > <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]type[Creature]eachgetsortan[]]"> "},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/ViewTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/ViewTemplate","created":"20171029160128139","list-before":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","modified":"20181215190616955","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]is[current]type[Creature]]"> {{||$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/StatBlockTemplate}} "},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/htmlTemplates":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/htmlTemplates","created":"20170920150110422","modified":"20181215182622521","tags":"$:/tags/RawMarkup","type":"text/html","text":" "},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/lookups":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/lookups","column_order":"title size creature_type subtype alignment challenge_rating","created":"20201025172145284","modified":"20201025172513326","tags":"","type":"application/x-tiddler-dictionary","text":"title:Name size:Size creature_type:Type subtype:Subtype alignment:Alignment challenge_rating:CR"},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/readme","created":"20181217185930783","modified":"20181217190804231","tags":"","text":"The [[Creature Manager|$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager]] plugin is a tool for displaying Stat Blocks for D&D 5e creatures.
Select a Monster: <$select tiddler="$:/temp/CreatureManager/Monster"> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]type[Creature]]">
<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/temp/CreatureManager/Monster}}> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/ViewTemplate"> {{Kobold||$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/ViewTemplate}}
"},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/Log":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/Log","caption":"Log","created":"20201028165251325","modified":"20210708183542130","tags":"$:/tags/SideBar","text":"\define custom_roll_actions() <$wikify name="text" output="html" text="| !Custom Roll
{{$:/temp/roll}} | | <$diceroll>{{$:/temp/roll}}|"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$:/temp/log/roll" tags="Roll" text=<> /> \end <$keyboard key="Enter" actions=<> > <$edit-text size="12" tag="input" default="" placeholder="2d6+3" tiddler="$:/temp/roll" /> <$button actions=<>>Roll <$button> Clear Log <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/temp/log]]"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> />
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/temp/log]!sortan[]]"> <$transclude mode="block" />
"},"$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList":{"title":"$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList","caption":"{{$:/language/Search/DefaultResults/Caption}}","created":"20201106011307893","modified":"20201106011322628","tags":"$:/tags/SearchResults","text":"\define searchResultList() //{{$:/language/Search/Matches/Title}}// <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]!is[system]search:title{$(searchTiddler)$}sort[title]limit[250]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> //{{$:/language/Search/Matches/All}}// <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]!is[system]search{$(searchTiddler)$}sort[title]limit[250]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> \end <> "},"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/macro":{"title":"$:/plugins/D&DTools/CreatureManager/macro","created":"20201105233118545","modified":"20210708183652315","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define attack(name, bonus:"0", dmg, type, dmg2, type2) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" actions=""" <$wikify name="text" output="html" text="| !$(currentTiddler)$
$name$ |<| | ''Attack''
<$diceroll>1d20$bonus$ | ''Damage''
<$diceroll>$dmg$ $type$ <$diceroll silence=true>$dmg2$ $type2$ |"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$:/temp/log/roll" tags="Roll" text=<> /> """ > $name$ \end \define named-roll(name, roll) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" actions=""" <$wikify name="text" output="html" text="| !$(currentTiddler)$
$name$ | | <$diceroll>$roll$ |"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$:/temp/log/roll" tags="Roll" text=<> /> """ > $name$ \end "}}}
name: CreatureManager
